net.trystan

类 AsciiPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.trystan.AsciiPanel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible

    public class AsciiPanel
extends JPanel
    This simulates a code page 437 ASCII terminal display.
    作者:
    Trystan Spangler
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AsciiPanel

        public AsciiPanel()
        Class constructor. Default size is 80x24.

      • AsciiPanel

        public AsciiPanel(int width,
                  int height)
        Class constructor specifying the width and height in characters.
        参数:
        width -
        height -

      • AsciiPanel

        public AsciiPanel(int width,
                  int height,
                  AsciiFont font)
        Class constructor specifying the width and height in characters and the AsciiFont
        参数:
        width -
        height -
        font - if passing null, standard font CP437_9x16 will be used

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCharHeight

        public int getCharHeight()
        Gets the height, in pixels, of a character.
        返回:

      • getCharWidth

        public int getCharWidth()
        Gets the width, in pixels, of a character.
        返回:

      • getHeightInCharacters

        public int getHeightInCharacters()
        Gets the height in characters. A standard terminal is 24 characters high.
        返回:

      • getWidthInCharacters

        public int getWidthInCharacters()
        Gets the width in characters. A standard terminal is 80 characters wide.
        返回:

      • getCursorX

        public int getCursorX()
        Gets the distance from the left new text will be written to.
        返回:

      • setCursorX

        public void setCursorX(int cursorX)
        Sets the distance from the left new text will be written to. This should be equal to or greater than 0 and less than the the width in characters.
        参数:
        cursorX - the distance from the left new text should be written to

      • getCursorY

        public int getCursorY()
        Gets the distance from the top new text will be written to.
        返回:

      • setCursorY

        public void setCursorY(int cursorY)
        Sets the distance from the top new text will be written to. This should be equal to or greater than 0 and less than the the height in characters.
        参数:
        cursorY - the distance from the top new text should be written to

      • setCursorPosition

        public void setCursorPosition(int x,
                              int y)
        Sets the x and y position of where new text will be written to. The origin (0,0) is the upper left corner. The x should be equal to or greater than 0 and less than the the width in characters. The y should be equal to or greater than 0 and less than the the height in characters.
        参数:
        x - the distance from the left new text should be written to
        y - the distance from the top new text should be written to

      • getDefaultBackgroundColor

        public Color getDefaultBackgroundColor()
        Gets the default background color that is used when writing new text.
        返回:

      • setDefaultBackgroundColor

        public void setDefaultBackgroundColor(Color defaultBackgroundColor)
        Sets the default background color that is used when writing new text.
        参数:
        defaultBackgroundColor -

      • getDefaultForegroundColor

        public Color getDefaultForegroundColor()
        Gets the default foreground color that is used when writing new text.
        返回:

      • setDefaultForegroundColor

        public void setDefaultForegroundColor(Color defaultForegroundColor)
        Sets the default foreground color that is used when writing new text.
        参数:
        defaultForegroundColor -

      • getAsciiFont

        public AsciiFont getAsciiFont()
        Gets the currently selected font
        返回:

      • setAsciiFont

        public void setAsciiFont(AsciiFont font)
        Sets the used font. It is advisable to make sure the parent component is properly sized after setting the font as the panel dimensions will most likely change
        参数:
        font -

        public AsciiPanel clear()
        Clear the entire screen to whatever the default background color is.
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • clear

        public AsciiPanel clear(char character)
        Clear the entire screen with the specified character and whatever the default foreground and background colors are.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • clear

        public AsciiPanel clear(char character,
                        Color foreground,
                        Color background)
        Clear the entire screen with the specified character and whatever the specified foreground and background colors are.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        foreground - the foreground color or null to use the default
        background - the background color or null to use the default
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • clear

        public AsciiPanel clear(char character,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height)
        Clear the section of the screen with the specified character and whatever the default foreground and background colors are. The cursor position will not be modified.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        x - the distance from the left to begin writing from
        y - the distance from the top to begin writing from
        width - the height of the section to clear
        height - the width of the section to clear
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • clear

        public AsciiPanel clear(char character,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        Color foreground,
                        Color background)
        Clear the section of the screen with the specified character and whatever the specified foreground and background colors are.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        x - the distance from the left to begin writing from
        y - the distance from the top to begin writing from
        width - the height of the section to clear
        height - the width of the section to clear
        foreground - the foreground color or null to use the default
        background - the background color or null to use the default
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • write

        public AsciiPanel write(char character)
        Write a character to the cursor's position. This updates the cursor's position.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

      • write

        public AsciiPanel write(char character,
                        Color foreground)
        Write a character to the cursor's position with the specified foreground color. This updates the cursor's position but not the default foreground color.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        foreground - the foreground color or null to use the default
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls

        public AsciiPanel write(char character,
                        Color foreground,
                        Color background)
        Write a character to the cursor's position with the specified foreground and background colors. This updates the cursor's position but not the default foreground or background colors.
        参数:
        character - the character to write
        foreground - the foreground color or null to use the default
        background - the background color or null to use the default
        返回:
        this for convenient chaining of method calls
